attributes.action: Revoke The Sun's Licence For Printing Nude Prince Harry Pictures
attributes.additional_details: After the sun decided to print the nude pictures of prince harry, the government should revoke the sun's licence, mr murdock would have had to approve such printing, news international has no respect for anyone

rejection.details: In the UK, the press is not subject to state regulation. The Government believes that this is fundamental to our democracy. That is why the government does not interfere in what a newspaper or magazine chooses to publish
